system.description: This spell functions like interposing hand, except the hand can interpose, push, or strike one opponent you select. The hand can move up to 60 ft. and attack once per round. Attack bonus: caster level + Int/Wis/Cha mod + 11 (Str 33) - 1 (Large). It deals 1d8+11 damage; a creature struck must save (Fortitude) or be stunned for 1 round. The hand can interpose as interposing hand or bull rush as forceful hand (+15 on Strength check). Directing to a new target is a move action.

components.materialDescription: A leather glove (arcane focus); divine focus (divine).
